attributes.comment:
I am writing to protest the raising of these fees. International adoption is
extremely difficult, expensive, and fraught with delays and snags. Higher fees on
this end will add to the problem and I certainly don't see where the service will be
improved any. It is downright difficult, if not impossible, to speak to anyone
regarding our case, once filed. It has become impossible to complete most
adoptions in the time allowed (18 months for I-171H) and 15 months for
fingerprints. We already have to pay twice for these items. Increasing the cost
will simply penalize us more.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Janise D. Crumpler
